A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Some of the best dialogue and character-driven drama in the entire series. The action is fantastic\, and the Marvel-esque battle in the throne room felt new and fresh. Numerous \"holy s*** moments.\" Finn's plot line dragged badly and lacked payoff\, and flying Leia was goofy. The good outweighed the bad though: serious twists\, great acting (Adam Driver\, Mark Hamill and Carrie Fisher were all highlights)\, and great risks by Rian Johnson added up to a satisfying and fascinating experience.
